article:
'Nal Airport' is under construction outside Bikaner, Rajasthan, India.There is a
under construction domestic airport at nal 13 km from city which will start
its flights for Delhi and Jaipur from JulyâAugust 2012. The foundation stone of
the terminal was laid in March 2009 by Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot.
The airport will serve domestic flights starting in JulyâAugust 2012.
Nal Civil Airport at Bikaner will start in new financial
year.
